name: WP Disable Site Health
author: Louis Fico

sections.description:
The addition of the new Site Health screen can be useful but it exposes a lot of server information that should be kept private. This plugin disables this feature in WordPress.

Major features in WP Disable Site Health include:

  • No setup required!
  • Prevents the Site Health screen from exposing critical server information.
sections.installation: Upload the wp-disable-site-health folder to your wp-content/plugins directory, then Activate it. No configuration needed.

short_description: License: GPLv2 or later Disables new Site Health screen from WP Dashboard
